sobre-mi.title: About Me
sobre-mi.texto_sobreMi:
I’m a Multiplatform Development student focused on Full-Stack programming.
I aspire to find a job in the Multiplatform Development field, gain experience, acquire new knowledge, and strengthen my professional life.

I am an empathetic, detail-oriented, independent, and enthusiastic person, with skills focused on teamwork, assertive communication, problem-solving, responsibility, and proactivity. I enjoy learning from others and continuously improving myself.

proyectos.title: Projects
proyectos.info-proyecto1: A game where the user must guess the secret word within a limited number of attempts. The word is randomly selected by the program, and the user loses when the hangman drawing is completed.
proyectos.info-proyecto2: My personal web portfolio, where you can find some of my most outstanding projects, my technical skills, and a bit about my education.
proyectos.info-proyecto3: An encryptor where the user can write a text, and the encryptor encodes it with pre-programmed keys. The encryptor also allows decrypting the text.
